Text: The Story of the Treasure Seekers:  First published in 1899, it tells the story of Dora, Oswald, Dicky, Alice, Noel, and Horace Octavius (H. O.) Bastable, and their attempts to assist their widowed father and recover the fortunes of their family; its sequels are "The Wouldbegoods" (1899) and "The New Treasure Seekers" (1904).
